ui.comp3111

Class Chart

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.comp3111.Chart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Chart
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Chart is to help displaying difference type of chart to UI. This class work closely with UI and have the following feature. 1. At start, Main.java will update the chartList by get the array of chartTypes. 2. During init the Scenes, Main will get "chart_container" and make it as the chrildren of it's scenes. 3. When click "plot" button in "SCENE_INIT_SCREEN", main will input the chart data by call Chart's function.
    Author:
    lotusfa
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • show_chart

        public static void show_chart(int chart_type)
        To display one chart to UI by adding the chart object to "chart_container" chart object ( eg. "lineChart", "pieChart", "ani_lineChart" )
        Parameters:
        chart_type - - index of chart type

      • update_chart

        public static void update_chart(int chart_type,
                                java.lang.String tittle,
                                DataTable table,
                                java.lang.String col1Name,
                                java.lang.String col2Name)
        Input data to the chart and call the corresponding function base on it's chart type. (ie. When chart_type is 0, this function will pass the input data to "lineChart_update()" )
        Parameters:
        chart_type - - index of chart type
        tittle - - tittle of chart
        table - - DataTable of data
        col1Name - - first column name of data in table
        col2Name - - second column name of data in table

      • stop_animate

        public static void stop_animate()
        the function to stop the animation for animation line chart
